content: not sure how to report an issue with Google social login on community.fhir.org. I looked at the Welcome message to see if there is a place to report issues with the site, but I don't see. I'm not able to log in to my account because of this issue [image.png], (/user_uploads/10155/JVGAnZ938HKa3eZCUe27jXNo/image.png)
It's a known issue. We're having trouble getting community.fhir.org set up to properly use SSL.
Thanks Lloyd. Is this the proper place to report site issues?
Security vulnerabilities should be sent by PM, but otherwise, yes.
